title: Vegan Breakfast Hash
directions: Drizzle olive oil over sweet potato and potato cubes. Season with spices. Spread sweet potatoes/potatos on baking sheet in a single layer. Roast in the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Stir. Roast for another 25 minutes.

In a large skillet, heat more olive oil. Add red pepper and onion. Season with salt, pepper and crushed red pepper flakes. Saute until onion is translucent, about 5-6 minutes. Add garlic and saute for another minute or two. Mix with roasted sweet potatoes/potatos and stir well to combine. Add chopped parsley.
ingredients: 1/2 large sweet potato, peeled and diced
